### data 
-   [caRolina](https://github.com/gallochris/R_scraps): sharing code while learning how to use [R](https://www.r-project.org/).
-   [dadgumboxscores.com](https://dadgumboxscores.com): find any UNC
    men's basketball box score since 2003-2004, and [code](https://github.com/gallochris/dadgum-shiny) for the archived Shiny app.
-   [CFB FGs](https://cfbfgs.fly.dev/): a Shiny app that tracks the play-by-play of field goals during the 2022 college football season.
